title: Storm Outlook From The Highest Peak In The Northeast
teaser: Mount Washington is the most prominent mountain east of the Mississippi and is famous for its erratic and dangerous weather.
contentencoded:
A huge storm is closing in on the Northeast and will possibly bring some of the heaviest snowfall in history.

While cities emergency management teams hunker down, we check in on the summit of Mount Washington to see what conditions are like up there and what’s expected.

Mount Washington is the highest peak in the Northeast and is famous for erratic and dangerous weather conditions.

Here & Now’s Lisa Mullins speaks with Caleb Meute, weather observer and education specialist for the Mount Washington Observatory.

Guest

  • Caleb Meute, weather observer and education specialist for the Mount Washington Observatory. He tweets @CalebMeute.
